sentences.sentence: This procedure ensures correct placement of the catheter.
sentences.translation: 这个程序可保证导液管的正确置入。

sentences.sentence: Natural selection ensures only the fittest survive to pass their genes on to the next generation.
sentences.translation: 物竞天择确保只有最适应环境的物种才得以生存下来，把基因传递给下一代。

sentences.sentence: The humidity of the bathroom ensures that it grows well.
sentences.translation: 浴室的湿度能确保它生长良好。
